name: The Case of the Hockey Bar Brawl
name_original: The Case of the Hockey Bar Brawl
description:
Made during the 2015 WTF Game Jam, this text adventure puts you in the shoes of Cassie, a young amateur detective fueled by noir fantasies and nicotine.

Search for clues, talk to witnesses, find out what happened on the night of the hockey bar brawl, and then decide what Cassie is going to do about it.

This grew out of a story idea held by a few of the creators and acts as a kind of proof of concept of the world and style of gameplay. We think it's fun.

Credits

Michael Elliott | @kindelingboy
Andrew Ferguson | @warandpeace
Serge Yager | @sergeyager
